### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and pipes connecting them.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 46}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=52.0, y=-80.0), energy=1600.0, tile_dimensions=TileDimensions(tile_width=2.0, tile_height=2.0), warnings=['no ingredients to smelt'], status=EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, furnace_source=Inventory({}), furnace_result=Inventory({'copper-plate': 38}))

### Iron plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 46}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=52.0, y=-82.0), energy=1600.0, tile_dimensions=TileDimensions(tile_width=2.0, tile_height=2.0), warnings=['no ingredients to smelt'], status=EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, furnace_source=Inventory({}), furnace_result=Inventory({'iron-plate': 36}))

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 19}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=62.0, y=-54.0), energy=1600.0, tile_dimensions=TileDimensions(tile_width=2.0, tile_height=2.0), warnings=['no ingredients to smelt'], status=EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, furnace_source=Inventory({'stone': 1}), furnace_result=Inventory({'stone-brick': 2}))

### Lab at position unknown
Consists of Lab(lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 50}, status=EntityStatus.NO_POWER, research=automation, electrical_id=1463)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted and has available space.
- Check the entity's status and warnings before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected.
- Check the entity's connection points and fluid systems before attempting to connect.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group and has a fluid present in its connections.
- Check the offshore pump's status and warnings before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a power network and has an input liquid.
- Check the steam engine's status and warnings before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt and is not full.
- Check the furnace's status and warnings before attempting to use it.
